document_data.name: Sanjos Irridan
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Sanjos Irridan''' was a [[vampire]] [[necromancer]] and [[surgeon]] who sold [[undead graft]]s at the [[Corpse Market]] in the [[Shadowfell]] city of [[Evernight]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|An arm and a leg for less than an arm and a leg|Sanjos Irridan's slogan}}
document_data.Activities: He sold body parts, including those which were [[magic]]ally animated and could be grafted onto a living person. He would also perform the actual grafting of the body part onto a client for an extra fee. This required a complicated and vile [[ritual]] that no sane or reasonable person would generally wish for.
document_data.History: As of {{Yearlink|1479}}, Sanjos Irridan was the most famous provider of grafts at the Corpse Market. A large banner over his shop proudly displayed the slogan: "an arm and a leg for less than an arm and a leg."
